snippet: International Business Machines Corp, the world's largest technology services company, reported its seventh straight quarterly decline in revenue that also fell short of estimates, hurt by lower demand for its services and hardware....

headline.print_headline: IBM Revenue Falls Short of Expectations, Shares Fall
headline.main: IBM Revenue Falls Short of Expectations, Shares Fall

lead_paragraph: International Business Machines Corp, the world's largest technology services company, reported its seventh straight quarterly decline in revenue that also fell short of estimates, hurt by lower demand for its services and hardware.
